attributes.action: stop the institutional ageism that is being created by the government's laws and policies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To merge the tiered system of the minimum wage which promotes ageism in employment to one minimum wage for all.

To stop discriminating against young people with income benefits as well as housing benefits which makes young people especially more vulnerable.

Put an end to age discrimination and adhere to European age discrimination laws.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
